author: neeraj
msg: Setting the default value to 'false'. We only support the 'true' value in DOMBuilder
which is taken care in DOMBuilderImpl.

author: neeraj
msg: DOMBuilder always checks for well-formedness. Doing appropriate changes so that default parameter value is 'true' and setting to 'false' is not allowed.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fix a problem when searching for the port boundary.
Do not accept any index before the beginning of the host.
Made some Javadoc corrections as well.

author: elena
msg: Fix endless loop after continue-after-fatal-error is set to true: bug #18271.
